name: Barney Bear Meets Santa Claus
overview: Barney Bear Meets Santa Claus is an educational game for children aged two to six. It consists of two parts: the first one is a story book where Barney Bear is visited by Santa and gets to follow him to the toy factory. The story is told through narrated pictures and for each one the player can interact with the scene by clicking on various objects. To continue the story a specific object has to be clicked on. The second part takes place in the toy factory which contains various activities. This include the following games: a spelling game where a word has to be unscrambled by clicking the letters in the right order a mix-up-the-parts toy machine where toys are created by choosing different parts a find-the-elf game where parcels are shown and the one with the elf in has to be clicked on a missing letter game where a alphabetic sequence is shown and the missing letter has to be clicked on a coloring book
